name: Freelance Graphics Presentation File
summary: Learn about .PRZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The Freelance Mobile Screen Show Player has been discontinued.

description: Slide show presentation created by Freelance Graphics, an older presentation software originally developed by Lotus, who was acquired by IBM; saves a series of slides, typically including a title, subpoints, and graphics on each slide; can still be viewed using the Freelance Mobile Screen Show Player.
